application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3b,c,d,e and f (submission of details) of listed building consent 24/01884 (Internal refurbishment works: enlargement of lobby hall; fire insulate access staircase from 2F to 3F to comply with building regulations; conversion of internal single door to French double door in main livng room, removal of modern dropped ceiling with its recessed spotlights; relocation of kitchen door; replacement of carpet throughout (including staircases) with new engineered timber floor and provide acoustic insulation; replacement of casement windows with slim line double glazed timber sash windows to rear and side elevations; and include air-con units inside joinery)
